chess

Class Queen

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.ChessPiece
      • chess.Queen

  • public class Queen
extends ChessPiece
    This is the Queen class, a subclass of the abstract class ChessPiece. A Queen is defined by its ability to move diagonally, vertically, or horizontally as long as it does not reach out of the board.
    Author:
    Pedro Cruz
